1.name: The Exorcist
1.description: When a teenage girl is possessed by a mysterious entity, her mother seeks the help of two priests to save her daughter.

2.name: The Wicker Man
2.description: A Police Sergeant is sent to a Scottish island village in search of a missing girl who the townsfolk claim never existed. Stranger still are the rites that take place there.

3.name: Mean Streets
3.description: A small-time hood aspires to work his way up the ranks of a local mob.

4.name: American Graffiti
4.description: A couple of high school grads spend one final night cruising the strip with their buddies before they go off to college.

5.name: Soylent Green
5.description: In the world ravaged by the greenhouse effect and overpopulation, an NYPD detective investigates the murder of a big company CEO.

6.name: Papillon
6.description: A man befriends a fellow criminal as the two of them begin serving their sentence on a dreadful prison island, which inspires the man to plot his escape.

7.name: La montaña sagrada
7.description: In a corrupt, greed-fueled world, a powerful alchemist leads a Christ-like character and seven materialistic figures to the Holy Mountain, where they hope to achieve enlightenment.

8.name: A Warm December
8.description: Dr. Matt Younger and his daughter arrive for a month-long visit to London for dirt-bike racing and unexpectedly, a new romance for the widowed Dr. Younger. His new love interest is the ...                See full summary »

9.name: Don't Look Now
9.description: A married couple grieving the recent death of their young daughter are in Venice when they encounter two elderly sisters, one of whom is psychic and brings a warning from beyond.

10.name: The Sting
10.description: Two grifters team up to pull off the ultimate con.

11.name: Serpico
11.description: An honest New York cop named Frank Serpico blows the whistle on rampant corruption in the force only to have his comrades turn against him.

12.name: The Long Goodbye
12.description: Private investigator Philip Marlowe helps a friend out of a jam then gets implicated in his wife's murder.

13.name: Live and Let Die
13.description: 007 is sent to stop a diabolically brilliant heroin magnate armed with a complex organization and a reliable psychic tarot card reader.

14.name: Robin Hood
14.description: The story of the legendary outlaw is portrayed with the characters as humanoid animals.

15.name: Enter the Dragon
15.description: A martial artist agrees to spy on a reclusive crime lord using his invitation to a tournament there as cover.

16.name: Westworld
16.description: A robot malfunction creates havoc and terror for unsuspecting vacationers at a futuristic, adult-themed amusement park.

17.name: Badlands
17.description: An impressionable teenage girl from a dead-end town and her older greaser boyfriend embark on a killing spree in the South Dakota badlands.

18.name: Malizia
18.description: A widower and two of his sons become infatuated by their beautiful housekeeper, and all three set out to seduce her using their own unique methods.

19.name: Contes immoraux
19.description: An erotic collection of short stories, an anthology comprised of tantalizing tales about sexual desire and its diverse manifestations.

20.name: High Plains Drifter
20.description: A gunfighting stranger (Clint Eastwood) comes to the small settlement of Lago and is hired to bring the townsfolk together in an attempt to hold off three outlaws who are on their way.

21.name: La planète sauvage
21.description: On a faraway planet where blue giants rule, oppressed humanoids rebel against their machine-like leaders.

22.name: Kanashimi no beradonna
22.description: An evil feudal lord rapes a village girl on her wedding night and proceeds to ruin her and her husband's lives. After she's eventually banished from her village, the girl makes a pact with the devil to gain magical ability and take revenge.

23.name: The Last Detail
23.description: Two Navy men are ordered to bring a young offender to prison, but decide to show him one last good time along the way.

24.name: Paper Moon
24.description: During the Great Depression, a con man finds himself saddled with a young girl who may or may not be his daughter, and the two forge an unlikely partnership.

25.name: Coffy
25.description: A black nurse takes vigilante justice against inner-city drug dealers after her sister becomes their latest victim.

26.name: Magnum Force
26.description: San Francisco Inspector "Dirty" Harry Callahan (Clint Eastwood) is on the trail of vigilante Police Officers who are not above going beyond the law to kill the city's undesirables.

27.name: Walking Tall
27.description: Based on the life of Tennessee sheriff Buford Pusser whom almost single-handily cleaned up his small town of crime and corruption, but at a personal cost of his family life and nearly his own life.

28.name: The Way We Were
28.description: Two disparate people have a wonderful romance, but their political views and convictions drive them apart.

29.name: The Day of the Jackal
29.description: A professional assassin codenamed "Jackal" plots to kill Charles de Gaulle, the President of France.

30.name: Amarcord
30.description: A series of comedic and nostalgic vignettes set in a 1930s Italian coastal town.

31.name: The Last of Sheila
31.description: A year after Sheila is killed in a hit-and-run, her multi-millionaire husband invites a group of friends to spend a week on his yacht playing a scavenger hunt-style mystery game. The game turns out to be all too real and all too deadly.

32.name: Jesus Christ Superstar
32.description: Film version of the musical stage play, presenting the last few weeks of Christ's life told in an anachronistic manner.

33.name: The Legend of Hell House
33.description: Physicist Lionel Barrett and his wife lead a team of mediums into the Belasco House, which is supposedly haunted by the victims of its late owner, a six-foot-five serial killer.

34.name: La grande bouffe
34.description: A group of men go to a villa in the French countryside where they resolve to eat themselves to death.

35.name: The Three Musketeers
35.description: A young swordsman comes to Paris and faces villains, romance, adventure and intrigue with three Musketeer friends.

36.name: Il mio nome è Nessuno
36.description: A young, easygoing gunman (Hill) worships and competes with an old gunfighter (Fonda) who only wants to retire.

37.name: Scarecrow
37.description: Max, an ex-con drifter with a penchant for brawling is amused by Lion, a homeless ex-sailor, and they partner up as they head east together.

38.name: Charlotte's Web
38.description: A gentle and wise grey spider with a flair for promotion pledges to save a young pig from slaughter for dinner food.

39.name: Penny Gold
39.description: While investigating a murder case, a detective stumbles upon a rare-stamp swindle involving the victim's twin sister.

40.name: Charley Varrick
40.description: A man, his wife, and their friend, stage a bloody bank robbery, unaware they are stealing money from the Mob.

41.name: The Paper Chase
41.description: A first-year law student at Harvard Law School struggles with balancing his coursework and his relationship with the daughter of his sternest professor.

42.name: The Crazies
42.description: The military attempts to contain a manmade combat virus that causes death and permanent insanity in those infected, as it overtakes a small Pennsylvania town.

43.name: Pat Garrett & Billy the Kid
43.description: Pat Garrett is hired as a lawman on behalf of a group of wealthy New Mexico cattle barons to bring down his old friend Billy the Kid.

44.name: Theater of Blood
44.description: A Shakespearean actor takes poetic revenge on the critics who denied him recognition.

45.name: The Golden Voyage of Sinbad
45.description: Sinbad and the vizier of Marabia, followed by evil magician Koura, seek the three golden tablets that can gain them access to the ancient temple of the Oracle of All Knowledge.

46.name: The Satanic Rites of Dracula
46.description: In London in the 1970s, Scotland Yard police investigators think they have uncovered a case of vampirism. They call in an expert vampire researcher named Professor Lorrimer Van Helsing (a ...                See full summary »

47.name: La nuit américaine
47.description: A committed film director struggles to complete his movie while coping with a myriad of crises, personal and professional, among the cast and crew.

48.name: Anita
48.description: Anita is a girl of only teenage years, and while she has developed early physically, to a mature woman, she is emotionally struggling. Her relationship with her parents and her friends is ...                See full summary »

49.name: Sleeper
49.description: A nerdish store owner is revived out of cryostasis into a future world to fight an oppressive government.

50.name: I corpi presentano tracce di violenza carnale
50.description: A string of appalling lust murders shocks the University of Perugia as a sadistic serial killer strangles to death beautiful college girls with a red and black scarf.
